$George Case left with a bad shoulder

$Finney left with the hand injury sustained in top of 1st
$Foul tip by Doerr hit Turner's finger, forcing him to leave
$Busted squeeze, but Partee tried for rundown and runner scored
$Game called after 5 innings for 'Sunday Law' curfew
$57 minute rain delay
$Game called for rain

$McGhee's homer was a high fly down the line; a fan reached into fair territory trying to catch the ball, which fell onto the field; umpire Summers waved McGheee arouned for a home run; Boston protested strongly
